description: All agents have identical activity counts, which is unusual and may indicate a lack of diversity in task distribution or a potential logging error.
recommendation: Investigate the task allocation mechanism to ensure that tasks are being distributed appropriately among agents. Check for any logging or reporting errors that might be causing identical activity counts.

description: The API latency and throughput values are unusually high compared to typical system performance metrics, which could indicate a bottleneck or inefficiency in the system.
recommendation: Conduct a detailed analysis of the API calls and throughput processes to identify any bottlenecks or inefficiencies. Consider optimizing the API endpoints or increasing resources to handle the load more effectively.

description: The memory usage is relatively high at 68%, which could lead to potential issues if the system experiences a spike in demand.
recommendation: Monitor memory usage trends over time and consider optimizing memory-intensive processes or increasing available memory resources to prevent potential issues during peak demand periods.
